p: The beauty and fragrance of rose flowers have been known since ancient times. The first historical reports of roses were found in old Chinese and Sanskrit texts. Fossil findings dating from about 40 million years ago indicate that Rosa species have existed on the planet since at least that time [ 1, 2, 3]. Up to the present day, roses are one of the most important groups of ornamental plants, a sign of inspiration, purity, love, happiness, and beauty, called the “Gift of angles”, “Queen of flowers”, and “Gol-E-Mohammadi” [ 1, 2, 3, 4].
